title: D-Link D-View uploadFile Directory Traversal Arbitrary File Creation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to create arbitrary files on affected installations of D-Link D-View. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the uploadFile function. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied path prior to using it in file operations. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create files in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: D-Link has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://supportannouncement.us.dlink.com/announcement/publication.aspx?name=SAP10332
timeline:
2022-12-23 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-05-24 - Coordinated public release of advisory
